section.name: Introduction
section.p: This page provides a list of publications in the Kandula environment.

ul.li:
H. Erven, H. Hicker, C. Huemer and M. Zapletal:
"The Web Services–BusinessActivity–Initiator (WS-BA–I) Protocol: an Extension to the Web Services–BusinessActivity Specification", March 2007.
Presented at the IEEE Int'l. Conference on Web Services 2007, PDF available
WS-BA-I enables the use of WS-BusinessActivity in a clear three-tier architecture. The autors provided implementations of WS-BA and WS-BA-I to the Kandula project, which was also the first implemenation of WS-BA-I.
